abstract: IndyCar Series officials meet with about two dozen drivers in Indianapolis to discuss ways to avoid catastrophic crashes, following Las Vegas accident that killed Dan Wheldon.
snippet: As the IndyCar Series investigates the wreck that killed Dan Wheldon, drivers defended top racing officials.
lead_paragraph: As the IndyCar Series investigates the wreck that killed Dan Wheldon, drivers defended top racing officials.

headline.main: Declining to Criticize, IndyCar Drivers Discuss Safety With Top Racing Officials
headline.print_headline: Declining to Criticize, IndyCar Drivers Discuss Safety With Top Racing Officials
headline.seo: Drivers Discuss Safety With Top IndyCar Officials
